title: Dissolution
narrative_function: Resistance collapse; Viktor's wisdom; Saga faces binary choice

saga_lindstrom.emotional_state: Exhausted, grieving, calculating survival options; hollowed out by moral responsibility and defeat
knowledge_gained: The Signal group dissolved from 89 to 12 members in hours, then deleted
Most members submitted to biometric enrollment to stop harassment
Some members fled Malmö for older buildings in other cities
Viktor believes surrender is wisdom, not failure—he tells her to save herself
Viktor frames his resistance as 'his fight to lose' because he's 71, while she has decades ahead
Erik's compliance meeting presents binary choice: enroll by Monday or face lease review (veiled eviction)
Lena's funding review committee meets Thursday—retaliation confirmed but unprovable
Running to other cities only delays the problem as smart systems spread everywhere
The resistance was morally right but lacked institutional power to matter
She's beginning to calculate which option (submit or flee) costs her less
decisions_made: Visited Viktor in hospital despite her exhaustion
Deleted the Signal group herself—took responsibility for ending it
Asked Erik for until Monday to decide on enrollment (bought time but tacit acceptance of terms)
Emailed Lena asking about older buildings in Stockholm (exploring escape option)
Promised Viktor she wouldn't sacrifice herself for lost causes
Did NOT make final decision yet—still weighing options
saga_lindstrom.character_development: Moved from active resistance to exhausted calculation; no longer asking 'should I fight?' but 'what costs me less?'; experiencing grief for the movement she built and destroyed; learning that being right doesn't equal being powerful; beginning to internalize the rationality of capitulation
saga_lindstrom.internal_conflict: Survival vs. principle; exhaustion vs. defiance; Viktor's wisdom about letting go vs. her desire to have stood for something; recognition that she's already doing cost-benefit analysis signals internal surrender even before external decision
saga_lindstrom.physical_state: Exhausted, dark circles under eyes, new lines at mouth corners, cried until empty
saga_lindstrom.next_chapter_setup: Has weekend (two days) to decide: submit to biometric enrollment by Monday or begin escape plan to Stockholm; must choose between capitulation and flight
